meanings.definition: The action of signing up to receive a service or publication regularly.
meanings.sent1: My mom's subscriptions to the magazine always arrive on time.
meanings.sent2: I have a monthly subscription to my favorite streaming service.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to sign up for a subscription to the bird-watching channel.
meanings.sent4: Her love for books is like a never-ending subscription to knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Subscriptions make sure you never miss out on the latest updates.

meanings.definition: The amount of money paid regularly to receive a service or publication.
meanings.sent1: The subscriptions for the online course were quite affordable.
meanings.sent2: She canceled her gym subscriptions to save money.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank saved up enough for a year's worth of magazine subscriptions.
meanings.sent4: His subscriptions to various streaming platforms drained his wallet.
meanings.sent5: Subscriptions can add up, so it's important to budget wisely.
